content.raw:
I get some compiler warnings about the order of initialized variables. This should fix it:
~~~

diff -r 96df1fec7405 plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h
--- a/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h	Wed Apr 03 10:17:07 2013 -0700
+++ b/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h	Thu Apr 04 11:04:10 2013 -0700
@@ -235,9 +235,9 @@
 	AtlasBehaviorStepParams() :
 		step_index(0l),
 		foot_index(0),
+		duration(0.7f),
 		position(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f),
 		yaw(0.0f),
-		duration(0.7f),
 		normal(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f)
 	{}
 
~~~
content.html:
I get some compiler warnings about the order of initialized variables. This should fix it:

diff -r 96df1fec7405 plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h
--- a/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h   Wed Apr 03 10:17:07 2013 -0700
+++ b/plugins/AtlasSimInterface_1.0.5/include/AtlasControlTypes.h   Thu Apr 04 11:04:10 2013 -0700
@@ -235,9 +235,9 @@
    AtlasBehaviorStepParams() :
        step_index(0l),
        foot_index(0),
+       duration(0.7f),
        position(0.0f,0.0f,0.0f),
        yaw(0.0f),
-       duration(0.7f),
        normal(0.0f,0.0f,1.0f)
    {}
